name: THE GORDIAN GROUP, LLC
sampleDescriptions: Procurement issues surrounding job order contracting, cooperative purchasing and change orders.
Procurement issues surrounding job order contracting, cooperative purchasing and change orders.

JOC provisions in FY18 THUD Appropriations (S. 1655; H.R. 3354), cooperative purchasing issues in FY19 2019 Homeland Security Appropriations and FY 2020 Homeland Security Appropriations (P.L. 116-93).
Federal government contracting with job order contracting and change order issues in the context of the appropriations process. Title 41 issues. American Transportation Infrastructure Act (S. 2302).
